casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK
v.
Patricia BRACA, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 28, 2017 John A. Braca, Jr., self-represented, in support of the petition. David M. Bizar, in opposition.

The petition by the defendant John A. Braca, Jr., for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40182) is denied.
